Description:
There is a report which contains a string report scalar parameter, run this report in the genReport task in command line, error pops up.
The command is "genReport -mode runrender -format html -htmlType html -parameter "sample=hello" new_report.rptdesign". 

version:
Eclipse BIRT Designer Version 2.2.0.v20070205 Build <2.2.0.v20070209-0630>

Expected Result:
Assign "hello" to the report parameter.

report design file
cancel this bug, wrong use of option.
The command line should be: genReport --mode runrender --format html --htmlType html --parameter "sample=hello" new_report.rptdesign
